description: Hello King Midas, I'm having trouble choosing between opening a checking or a savings account. Do checking accounts usually earn a higher interest rate than a savings account?

King! So many of my friends have opened up credit cards, and I don't understand why they're playing around with money that's not even theirs like that. My friend said that credit cards can help build your credit history, but I don't buy that. Is this true?
Hello king, my husband and I are thinking of buying a CAR (chariot and racehorse), and we are taking out a loan. Are we supposed to take out a mortgage to purchase it?

My parents keep nagging me about paying off my credit card in time, but I don't understand the point in that if I'm going to pay it off in my own time. They say that late payments can lower your credit score, but is that really true?

Midas! The people say gold flows from your coffers because of your financial wisdom, so let's make a bet! If you deposit $1,000 in a savings account with an annual interest rate of 3%, will you earn $30 in interest after one year?

King Midas, forgive my question, but I am not great with math. If my credit limit on a credit card is $5,000, and I've used $2,000 of my available credit, is my credit utilization 30%? If you can help me sir, I can pay…!
My mother told me that a credit score of 850 is considered the lowest possible score, is this true? I think I want to trust you more than my mom…
Hello, King! I just learned about CDs in school, but I didn’t really pay attention. Are CDs a certificate of deposit, and do they require you to leave your money in the account for a fixed term?
I always hear about credit scores, but is it true that your credit score is based ONLY on your income and job history?
I've heard that defaulting on a loan can negatively impact your credit score. Is that true?
My friend and I were thinking about opening a joint account, but she said joint accounts are only available for married couples. Is that really the case, King Midas?

Hi King Midas, me again. If you invest $2,000 in a Certificate of Deposit (CD) for 2 years at an annual interest rate of 5%, will the total amount in your CD after 2 years be $2500, assuming simple interest?

If you carry a balance of $500 on your credit card with an annual interest rate of 18%, will you pay $7.50 in interest in one month? Assuming the monthly interest rate is 18% ÷ 12? Sorry, my abacus broke and I’m scared about the money I owe.
A friend told me that credit scores are only affected by the amount of debt you owe and not your payment history. Is that true?
King Midas! I'm trying to understand the difference between secured and unsecured loans. Does a secured loan require collateral, while an unsecured loan does not?
I heard that having a high credit score can help you qualify for loans with better interest rates. Is that true?

King Midas, asking for a friend that is not me,… if you take out a loan for $10,000 at an interest rate of 6% per year for 5 years, will your monthly payment approximately be $100 for a fixed-rate loan?

King Midas, can you help me do my homework? If you take out a loan of $15,000 at an interest rate of 5% for 3 years, will you pay $2,250 in interest by the end of the loan term? Assuming simple interest.
I was thinking about getting a debit card, but my friend said that it allows you to borrow money from the bank to make purchases. Is that correct?
I’ve been thinking about getting a credit card, but I don't want to mess up my credit score. Does using a credit card responsibly help you get better loan terms and interest rates in the future?
